attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to be tougher on benefit fraud. In particular the thousands of people who have now jumped on the "Im too ill to work" band wagon! Ridiculous and far too easy to get away with.This is costing tax payers millions of pounds every year,that money should be going to those who are genuinely ill not to those too bone idle to work,that is not an illness!
Get these investigated quicker,to court quicker and make the punishment fit the crime,might deter people from trying it on in the first place
